comment: Alternate definition of restricted "at most one." Note that ` E* x e. A ph ` is not equivalent to ` E. y e. A A. x e. A ( ph -> x = y ) ` (in analogy to ~ reu6 ); to see this, let ` A ` be the empty set. However, one direction of this pattern holds; see ~ rmo2i . (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)
